articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves for Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves for Equatorial Guinea
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, left here Tuesday to take part in the inaugural ceremony of the president of the Equatorial Guinea. 
					 He was seen off by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Mu Yong, vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Chemical Industry, and Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.

articles.title: Law on AML/CFT Adopted in DPRK
articles.content:
Law on AML/CFT Adopted in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Law of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Financing of Terrorism was adopted.
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK promulgated a decree on the adoption of the law on April 20.
					
					 The Law on AML/CFT consists of 6 chapters with 40 articles.
					
					 Chapter 1 (Articles 1-6) defines the fundamentals of the law such as its objective, principle in the AML/CFT efforts, the establishment of the National Coordinating Committee and the scope of application.
					
					 Chapter 2 (Article 7-24) specifies the obligations and principles of reporting institutions concerning the verification of identification data obtained from the customer, establishment of internal reporting system of large or suspicious transactions, reporting large or suspicious transactions and confidentiality.
					
					 Affiliation and status of the financial intelligence unit (FIU), obligations and powers of FIU, operation of database, etc. are stipulated in Chapter 3 (Articles 25-28).
					
					 Chapter 4 (Articles 29-31) concerning the supervisory and regulatory institutions clarifies the obligations and powers of the Financial Supervisory Bureau, functions of customs and obligations and powers of law enforcement institutions.
					
					 Principles in international cooperation, institutions involved in international cooperation, types of international cooperation for AML/CFT purposes are defined in Chapter 5 (Articles 32-34).
					
					 Chapter 6 (Articles 35-40) stipulates the property subject to sanctions, complaints in respect of AML/CFT and their settlement. 
					
					 The Law on Anti-Money Laundering adopted on Oct. 25, Juche 95 (2006) has no binding force any longer, the decree said.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Society Increases Its Capability
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Society Increases Its Capability
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Red Cross Society (RCS) is paying big efforts to developing its capability to make rapid response to disaster.
					 The society, in close cooperation with the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, has renewed its contingency plans while steadily improving the emergency system and ways.
					
					 It formed Red Cross relief squads in residential quarters with a possibility of disaster and has organized various courses and practical trainings through which RCS members, volunteers and officials concerned could possess of the ability to reliably carry out relief activities in case of disaster.
					
					 Meanwhile, the RCS upgraded the system of early warning on flood to the one ranging over different kinds of dangers and various fields.
					
					 It also published reference books on prevention of disasters in order to improve the skills of volunteers and relief workers and raise the awareness of disaster among citizens.
					
					 According to an official concerned, hundreds of RC volunteers played an active role in evacuating people from flood-hit areas of Rason City, North and South Hamgyong and South Hwanghae provinces last year and rendered first-aid and assistance to victims.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Call for Implementing Decision of WPK Seventh Congress
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Call for Implementing Decision of WPK Seventh Congress
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- There took place mass rallies in Jagang, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces on Tuesday to celebrate the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were officials and working people, youth and students of the party, power and economic bodies, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities in the provinces.
					
					 Speakers said that the party congress was a political event to be specially recorded in the history of the WPK and the country.
					
					 Through its congress the WPK fully demonstrated the revolutionary character and invincibility as the party of the great leaders, a Juche-oriented party which is glorifying its ever-victorious history and tradition and once again showcased to the world the political and ideological might of the revolutionary ranks single-mindedly united around the party and the leader, they noted, and continued:.
					
					 All the party members, officials and workers should make the flames of the Mallima speed campaign rage more furiously in the same spirit as that displayed in the 70-day campaign of loyalty and thus thoroughly implement the decision adopted at the party congress.
					
					 Everybody should wage an all-out charge and drive for implementing the decision of the party congress and thus make a positive contribution to accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation at an earlier date.
					
					 Then followed mass demonstrations.

articles.title: 19th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair to Be Held
articles.content:
19th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair to Be Held
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The 19th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair will be held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House from May 23 to 26.
					 It will bring together more than 220 companies from the DPRK, New Zealand, Germany, Russia, Romania, Malaysia, Mongolia, Singapore, China, Cambodia, Thailand, Australia, Iran, Italy, Indonesia, Vietnam, Cuba and Taipei of China.
					
					 Displayed there will be goods produced with the introduction of advanced science and technologies in the fields of electronics, machine, metal, building materials, transport, foodstuff and daily necessities industries.

articles.title: Non-smoking Research Stations Established in DPRK
articles.content:
Non-smoking Research Stations Established in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Non-smoking research stations have been established in provincial seats of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 According to an official concerned, the stations conduct their activities in close touch with Pyongyang-based Non-smoking Research Center.
					
					 Their action programs include the consultation among smokers and the service of nonsmoking health products recognized by WHO as well as medicines for treating diseases caused by smoking.
					
					 Meanwhile, a work is going on to develop more tobacco substitutes.
					
					 In recent years, an anti-smoking campaign has been intensified across the country.

articles.title: National Workshop on World Migratory Birds Day Held
articles.content:
National Workshop on World Migratory Birds Day Heldols
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A national workshop took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday on the occasion of the World Migratory Birds Day.
					Present there were officials and experts in environment protection of ministries and national institutions including the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and the Central Committee of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, scientific and research organs and relevant fields, members of the International Union for Conservation of Nature, the East Asian-Australasian Flyway Partnership, the Hanns Seidel Foundation of Germany, the Syrian ambassador to the DPRK and a staff member of the German embassy here.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 Speakers said that many migratory birds fly beyond boundaries of various countries, expanding the ecological border international- and regional- and world-wide.
					
					 The present situation where commercial use of birds  and trade in them are becoming brisk on world-wide underscores the importance of migratory birds in promoting mankind's well-being and conserving natural environment, they noted, underlining the need for international cooperation and exchange of knowledge and information.
					
					 The participants looked round photos introducing various species of migratory water birds.

articles.title: Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex Manufactures Highly Efficient Electric Locomotives
articles.content:
Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex Manufactures Highly Efficient Electric Locomotives
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Workers at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex successfully manufactured highly efficient electric locomotives by their own efforts and with indigenous technology.
					 Officials of the complex powerfully aroused the workers to display  revolutionary enthusiasm and creative initiative and ingenuity in the drive to perform new miracles and feats in manufacturing highly efficient electric locomotives by carrying forward the tradition of struggle established by heroes in the era of Chollima who produced electric locomotive Pulgungi (red flag) No. 1.
					
					 Nearly 100 proposals for new technology and work methods were applied to practice during the 70-day campaign.
					
					 Electric locomotive Pulgungi No. 5435 was assembled in a matter of just two days.

articles.title: Line of National Reunification Reflects Kim Jong Un's Ardent Patriotism
articles.content:
Line of National Reunification Reflects Kim Jong Un's Ardent Patriotism
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The line of national reunification clarified by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his report on the review of the work of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) serves as a great programme for reunification reflective of his firm faith and will and warm patriotism to put an earliest end to the tragic division of the nation and build a reunified and powerful country without fail.
					 Kim Jong Un said that we should not allow the national split to persist any longer but reunify the country in our generation without fail.
					
					 It is the fixed resolution and will of the WPK to carry out the lifelong intentions and behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and achieve the independent reunification of the country at any cost.
					
					 The WPK's line of national reunification is a Juche-oriented reunification line advanced by the great leaders.
					
					 The idea, line and policies for national reunification clarified by Kim Jong Un this time is the over-all inheritance and development in depth of the idea and line of independent reunification and the most fair and aboveboard reunification proposals advanced by the great leaders.
					
					 The cause of national reunification is aimed to re-link the blood ties of the nation and achieve national unity.
					
					 The WPK's line of national reunification calling for making positive efforts to overcome all sorts of misunderstanding, mistrust, contradiction and conflict caused by the division and bring about the great unity of the nation, mainstay of national reunification, is a great programme for reunification that brightly illuminates the path for achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has foiled the challenge and obstructions of the separatists at home and abroad and wisely led the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 On several occasions in the recent period he clarified the principled stand on creating an atmosphere of improving the relations between the north and the south.
					
					 The National Defence Commission of the DPRK sent a crucial proposal to the south Korean authorities and sent an open letter to the south Korean authorities and several political parties, social organizations and people from all walks of life. It also made a special proposal to the south Korean authorities out of the desire to open up a fresh phase for improving the north-south relations by holding fast to the three principles of national reunification. This is also indicative of his principled stand.
					
					 It was thanks to his patriotic will and bold decision for reunification that the north-south high-level contact was made, the reunions of separated families and relatives were ensured and a large group of players of the north side took part in the 17th Asian Games, presenting touching scenes of promoting national reconciliation and unity despite the grim situation, in which the anti-DPRK confrontational racket was frantically kicked up in south Korea.
					
					 The report made at the recent historic Party Congress called on all the Koreans to get united as one irrespective of ideology, ism and political belief for the great goal of national reunification. 
					
					 The differing ideologies and social systems existing in the north and the south can never be a reason for the same nation to mistrust and stand in confrontation with each other. The ism and interests of classes and strata can never be an obstacle to the unity of the nation.
					
					 The political parties and organizations at all levels in the north and the south have to realize contacts, visits, solidarity and alliance and create an atmosphere of reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The WPK's line of national reunification is the result of the bold decision made by Kim Jong Un out of patriotism and his noble will to put an end to mistrust and confrontation between the north and the south and usher in the new era of national reunification through national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the lodestar of national reunification and the great national unity who is possessed of noble intention and firm patriotic will for reunification and broad magnanimity and virtue of embracing all the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Local Production of Terracottem Realized in DPRK
articles.content:
Local Production of Terracottem Realized in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A research group of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK succeeded in local production of Terracottem, a highly effective agent for land amelioration and moisture keeping.
					 The group developed a new inorganic compound in substitution for acrylamide, an essential element of Terracottem, and settled scientific problems to use it in liquid condition.
					
					 It also found a method of mass-refining acrylic acid, a main component of Terracottem.
					
					 The newly-developed Terracottem helps raise the rooting rate of saplings up to over 90 percent and grow trees healthier with less consumption of water and manpower.
					
					 The use of fertilizer coated with this agent can considerably increase the yield of crops while reducing the fertilizer consumption 40 percent and manpower one third.

articles.title: Commander of U.S. Forces Discloses U.S. Invariable Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Commander of U.S. Forces Discloses U.S. Invariable Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The new commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea made a tour of Panmunjom on May 12 during which he cried out for keeping a strong command posture on the basis of the  more solid "south Korea-U.S. alliance" to suit the frequently and rapidly changing situation on the Korean peninsula, KBS of south Korea reported.
					 He chose Panmunjom as the first place for his public appearance since his assumption of the post, an indication of his scenario to deter "the north's provocation" by dint of the "south Korea-U.S. alliance", it added.
					
					 The war drumbeat made by him touring even the militarily most sensitive joint security area in Panmunjom as part of the plan to stifle the DPRK by force of arms brought to light his belligerent nature and the U.S. invariable hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It was reported that Clapper, director of the U.S. State Intelligence Agency, flew into south Korea on May 4 to negotiate a joint proposal for coping with the "provocation" of the north.

articles.title: Meeting of Koreans in Japan Celebrates Kim Jong Un's Election as WPK Chairman
articles.content:
Meeting of Koreans in Japan Celebrates Kim Jong Un's Election as WPK Chairman
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on May 14 in celebration of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were Chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Ho Jong Man, Vice-Chairmen Nam Sung U and Pae Ik Ju, Vice-Chairman Pae Jin Gu who doubles as director general of the General Affairs Department, Vice-Chairman Pak Ku Ho, Vice-Chairwoman Kang Chu Ryon who doubles as chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon Hong In Hum, advisors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and its department directors, leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area, officials of Chongryon, Koreans in Japan, teaching staff and students of Korean University and student representatives of Korean high schools.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in a report said that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK is a special event that would bring a new history of great victory to the movement of Koreans in Japan along with the homeland.
					
					 He extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the WPK, reflecting the unanimous loyalty of all Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 He called on them to get united close around Kim Jong Un and dynamically advance toward the hopeful future where victory and glory are promised under his guidance.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Art Performance Given in Tokyo in Celebration of Kim Jong Un's Election as WPK Chairman
articles.content:
Art Performance Given in Tokyo in Celebration of Kim Jong Un's Election as WPK Chairman
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on May 14 in celebration of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among the audience were Chairman Ho Jong Man, Vice-Chairmen Nam Sung U and Pae Ik Ju of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Vice-Chairman Pae Jin Gu who doubles as director general of the General Affairs Department, Vice-Chairman Pak Ku Ho, Vice-Chairperson Kang Chu Ryon who doubles as chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon Hong In Hum, advisors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and its department directors, leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area, officials of Chongryon, Koreans in Japan, teaching staff and students of Korean University and student representatives of Korean high schools.
					
					 The performance was given by the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe and Korean youth and students in Japan. Put on the stage were the song and dance "Kim Il Sung's Nation Is Best", male solo "Green Pine on Nam Hill", female solo "Ardent Desire" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The audience was excited to watch an image of Kim Jong Un finding himself among the people appearing on the background.
					
					 Choruses "My Motherland Full of Love" and "We Will Protect Flag of Republic Generation after Generation" presented by the members of the children's union in Kanto area and dance "Celebration Dance" given by the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe revved up the festive atmosphere.
					
					 The performers successfully represented the will of Koreans in Japan to creditably carry forward the tradition of patriotism while believing and following Kim Jong Un only and weathering all difficulties and trials by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Policies for National Reunification Supported by Chongryon Chairman
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Policies for National Reunification Supported by Chongryon Chairman
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- We fully and warmly support the policies of national reunification advanced by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his report on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and are filled with the firm determination to carry out them at any cost.
					 Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), said this in a statement on Monday.
					
					 At the Seventh Congress of the WPK Kim Jong Un clarified the new line and policies of national reunification to weather the difficulties and comprehensively indicated the ways of carrying out them, Ho said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un set forth the national independence, great national unity, ensuring of peace and realization of federal formula as the policies of national reunification according to the most just Juche-based line of reunification based on the transparent spirit of national independence and comprehensively applied to the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 He also clearly indicated the ways of fundamentally improving the north-south relations which are urgently required at present, and clarified even the principled issues arising in those countries concerned with the division of Korea and its neighboring countries.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will uphold the reunification policies indicated by Kim Jong Un, the great lodestar of national reunification, in one mind and with every possible effort, and make a tangible contribution to building a dignified and prosperous reunified power, an advanced highly civilized nation with 80 million population and tremendous national power on the beloved land.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will discharge their honorable mission and patriotic duty in the struggle to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification, full of conviction of certain victory and optimism that Korea is sure to be reunified thanks to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Protest Japanese Authorities' Discrimination against Korean Schools
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Protest Japanese Authorities' Discrimination against Korean Schools
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Those concerned with the Korean schools in Japan including members of Korean schools, the Mothers Society of Korean Schools, the Korean Middle and High School Students Committee and the Liaison Society of Korean High School Graduates in Kanto area visited the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on May 10 to protest the unreasonable discrimination against the Korean schools in Japan.
					 They handed the letter of protest and written request adopted at the meeting held at the educational hall in Japan on April 20 and the emergency meeting of mothers on April 8 addressed to the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology.
					
					 They denounced the Japanese government for exempting the Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools and payment of subsidies for political reasons.
					
					 The headmaster of Saitama Korean Primary Middle and High School disclosed the unfairness of the notice "Points of consideration in paying subsidies to Korean schools" the ministry sent to the governors of the urban and rural prefectures where the Korean schools were operated.
					
					 They urged the government and the ministry of Japan to sincerely accept the immediate lifting of discriminating measure as recommended by the U.N. Committee on the Elimination of All Forms of Racial Discrimination.
					
					 Meanwhile, Koreans in various parts of Japan are staging ceaseless protest actions in demand of the Japanese authorities' lifting of discrimination against Korean schools.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Supreme Programme of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Supreme Programme of WPK
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- It is the unshakable faith and will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to hasten the final victory of the Juche revolution under the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, says Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday in an article.
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the new century of Juche and declared it as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 By modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism it means that the WPK pushes forward the Korean revolution with great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the unique guidelines and build and develop an ideal society of the people guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. In other words, it means training all members of the society as genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists and transforming politics, military, economy, culture and all other fields as required by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism to fully realize the independence of the popular masses. 
					
					 Modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as the supreme programme of the WPK because it specifies the ultimate goal of the party and the scientific strategy and policies to attain it, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The main task of the DPRK is to accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 It is necessary to firmly adhere to the general line of the party and self-development-first principle in order to successfully build a socialist power under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: DPRK's Access to Nukes Is Attributable to U.S. Hostile Policy: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Access to Nukes Is Attributable to U.S. Hostile Policy: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The balance of forces on the earth has dramatically changed owing to the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and this is mainly attributable to the U.S. hostile policy toward the former, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Peace can be preserved and protected only by powerful arms, not by talking or writing. 
					
					 The DPRK took an independent counteraction against the hostile acts of the U.S. to physically bring down it. For the DPRK to cope with the threat of the hostile forces with measures for self-defence is an inviolable right as it is a legitimate right of a sovereign state stipulated in the UN Charter.
					
					 The U.S. is the chief criminal that spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and compelled the DPRK to have access to nukes and is posing the potential nuclear threat to it.
					
					 Being a non-nuclear state by nature, the DPRK more ardently desired denuclearization on the peninsula than any others and made every possible effort for the denuclearization of the peninsula since the U.S. started introducing nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					
					 But, all this proved futile due to the U.S.
					
					 The reality proves that no issue can be solved but only confrontation and danger of conflict will be escalated unless the U.S. deep-rooted hostile policy toward the DPRK is brought to an end.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes is the most right option taken by itself in the present world where the weak cannot protect himself. 
					
					 The DPRK will not be the first to dismantle its nukes unless the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and fundamentally removes its nuclear threat, 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear attack capability will be bolstered up dramatically.

articles.title: Scandals of High-ranking Military Officials of S. Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
Scandals of High-ranking Military Officials of S. Korea Disclosed
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Irregularities and corruption have been disclosed one after another among south Korean high-ranking military officials, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The Board of Audit and Inspection investigated the Ministry of Defense, the Agency for Defense Affairs and the Headquarters of the Army. The results confirmed the fact that equipment whose performance is not suitable for war training was supplied to companies.
					
					 The system for controlling drill ground which was said completed in September last year with the investment of 10.3 billion won did not fulfill its role of transmitting and receiving animation files of tanks and soldiers.
					
					 It is said that the high-ranking military officials were bribed by the LG Group for the introduction of the system developed by it.

articles.title: Workers Rally, Mass Rally Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Workers Rally, Mass Rally Held in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- There took place a workers rally, mass rally in Kwangju, south Korea on May 14 for inheriting the spirit of the 36th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Resistance under the sponsorship of the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity for Progress, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Attending it were workers, peasants, youth and students, more than 3 000 in all and lawmakers from the opposition parties.
					
					 The participants released a resolution. It said the successful April general election which punished the arrogance of the present regime by the strength of the people is requiring a more positive action.
					
					 At the rally speakers called upon workers and masses to get united to build a world where the south and the north live together, world where workers can work freely, peasants produce freely and all people are happy.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants made a grand march.

articles.title: Meeting Held in Russia to Congratulate Kim Jong Un on His Election as Chairman of WPK
articles.content:
Meeting Held in Russia to Congratulate Kim Jong Un on His Election as Chairman of WPK
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Moscow on May 13 to congratulate Marshal Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). It was sponsored by the Russian committee of public circles for supporting the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					 A report and speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK who doubles as chairman of the Russian committee of public circles for supporting the Seventh Congress of the WPK, said that the DPRK is fully demonstrating its might as a nuclear power, satellite manufacturer and launcher and working eye-opening miracles, ushering in the Mallima era under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Vanin, senior researcher of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, said Kim Jong Un made his historic report on accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution at the Seventh Congress of the WPK. 
					
					 Babrin, vice-president of the Association of the International Peace Foundation, expressed belief that the Korean people would surely achieve the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Zubrilin, bureau member of the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and deputy to the City Assembly, sincerely wished the Korean people bigger successes in their efforts to implement the tasks set forth at the party congress under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Marked in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of WPK Celebrated by Koreans China
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- An event was organized by Koreans in China at the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang, China on May 11 to lay a floral basket before the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together in celebration of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the painting and paid tribute.
					
					 It was attended by members of the General Association of Koreans in China and the Shenyang branch of the association.

articles.title: Celebrations Take Place in Different Countries
articles.content:
Celebrations Take Place in Different Countries
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Uganda, Ethiopia and Nigeria on May 10 and 11 to congratulate supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Film shown included Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity."
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress brings happiness and glory not only to the Korean people but also to the Ugandan people and other progressives of the world.
					
					 The chairperson of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia expressed belief that the Korean people, rallied close around Kim Jong Un, would achieve great success in the drive for carrying out the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted that Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK according to the unanimous will of all party members and other people, extending warm congratulations to him on leading the WPK and the Korean people only to victory after victory.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Body Condemns S. Korean Authorities for Group Abduction of DPRK's Citizens
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Body Condemns S. Korean Authorities for Group Abduction of DPRK's Citizens
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Barisal, Bangladesh on May 11 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' group allurement and abduction of DPRK's citizens. It was sponsored by the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy.
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy informed its attendants of the DPRK's principled stand regarding the said crime. Then followed speeches.
					
					 Speakers vehemently denounced the south Korean authorities for their unprecedented evil act of alluring and abducting a group of DPRK's citizens working abroad.
					
					 They demanded the south Korean authorities pay heed to the just demands of the families of the victims and send the abductees back immediately.
					
					 They declared they would carry on protest actions till the abductees are let to go back home safely and the criminals responsible for this incident are brought to justice.
					
					 A statement was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 It said that the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy would intensify the joint actions with different foreign solidarity organizations till the abductees are let go back home safely according to their will and wishes of their families.
					
					 It expressed firm belief that the DPRK would win a victory by foiling all sorts of challenges and moves of the hostile forces and extended solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: German Organization Assails South Korean Authorities for Detaining DPRK's Citizens
articles.content:
German Organization Assails South Korean Authorities for Detaining DPRK's Citizens
Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany issued a statement on May 12 to lambaste the south Korean authorities for alluring and abducting a group of DPRK's citizens to south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' allurement and abduction of the DPRK's citizens in group is an unethical crime.
					
					 Though the DPRK's citizens demanded the repatriation to the homeland, the south Korean authorities locked them up in solitary cells and disallowed them to express their will.
					
					 This case helps the world know well who is a real human rights abuser.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities send the abductees back home and discontinue all sorts of provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should make honest apology for their criminal acts and stop such base act of leaving a blot on history.
					
					 We urge the UN to restore its mission as a spokesman for justice and a genuine international organization.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean authorities that deserves international criticism, punishment and sanctions.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam parte hacia Guinea Ecuatorial
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam parte hacia Guinea Ecuatorial
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, partio el dia 17 de esta capital para tomar parte en la ceremonia de la toma de posesion del presidente de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial.
					Le despidieron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier y ministro de Industria Quimica Ri Mu Yong y el vicecanciller Ri Kil Song.

articles.title: Aprobada Ley contra lavado de dinero y financiacion a terrorismo de RPDC
articles.content:
Aprobada Ley contra lavado de dinero y financiacion a terrorismo de RPDC
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fue aprobada la Ley contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion al terrorismo. 
					Quedo publicado el 20 de abril pasado el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					La ley consta de 6 capitulos y 40 articulos. 
					
					El Capitulo I (articulos 1-6) dilucida los temas principales de la ley, entre otros, la mision de la ley, los principios contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion al terrorismo, la organizacion del comite estatal de coordinacion y los objetos de aplicacion de la ley. 
					
					El Capitulo II (articulos 7-24) indica el deber y el principio de trabajo del organo declarador como la verificacion de la identidad de los negociadores, el establecimiento del sistema de informacion interior y aviso sobre las transacciones sospechas y de gran cantidad y la observacion de secretos.
					
					El Capitulo III (articulos 25-28) se trata del organo de informacion financiera, incluso su dependencia, posicion, deber y autoridad, y la gestion de archivos. 
					
					El Capitulo IV (articulos 29-31) aclara el deber y autoridad del organo de control financiero, el deber de la aduana, y el deber y autoridad del organo juridico. 
					
					El Capitulo V (articulos 32-34) se refiere a los principios de cooperacion internacional y al organo y formas de cooperacion internacional. 
					
					El Capitulo VI (articulos 35-40) presenta los objetos de sancion y los metodos de reclamaciones y su solucion. 
					
					Segun el decreto, fue anulada la vigencia de la Ley sobre la Prevencion de Lavado de Dinero de la RPDC, aprobada el 25 de octubre del 95 (2006) de la Era Juche.

articles.title: ACRC eleva capacidad de contramedidas urgentes frente a desastres
articles.content:
ACRC eleva capacidad de contramedidas urgentes frente a desastres
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de Corea va elevando la capacidad de contramedidas urgentes frente a las calamidades.
					Coopera activamente con la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja para renovar los programas, sistemas y contramedidas urgentes.
					
					En las zonas pobladas con alta peligrosidad de calamidades, organiza los grupos de socorro de cruz roja e imparten cursillos y ejercicios practicos a los miembros de la asociacion, voluntarios y expertos para que estos cumplan bien varias actividades como la higiene acuatica, la asistencia medica y el socorro en los momentos de calamidades.
					
					Sustituyo el anterior sistema de alarma preventiva de inundacion por el otro que abarca todos los dominios de peligrosidades.
					
					Publican diversos manuales de referencia para elevar el nivel tecnico de los voluntarios y funcionarios concernientes y la concepcion de los habitantes sobre los desastres.
					
					Segun un funcionario interesado, en el ano pasado cuando ocurrieron las inundaciones en la ciudad de Rason y las provincias de Hamgyong del Norte y del Sur y de Hwanghae del Sur, la ACRC movilizo a cientos de voluntarios para evacuar a los damnificados a la zona estable.
					
					Intensifico el servicio de tratamiento urgente y la propaganda de salud publica e higienica en las zonas danadas y suministro a los habitantes los materiales de socorro urgente inclusive las tiendas, los utensilios de cocina, las mantas y las pildoras de purificacion de agua.
					
					Sobre todo, en la ciudad de Rason pusieron en funcionamiento los equipos moviles de purificacion de agua.

articles.title: Determinan la materializacion cabal de la resolucion de VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Determinan la materializacion cabal de la resolucion de VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este martes en las provincias de Jagang, Hamgyong del Sur y Ryanggang los mitines multitudinarios para festejar el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Asistieron a los actos los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de los organismos locales del partido y el Poder, organos economicos, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades, etc. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el VII Congreso del PTC fue un acontecimiento politico a ser registrado especialmente en las historias del PTC y la patria. 
					
					A traves del conclave, se han manifestado de nuevo a todo el mundo el caracter revolucionario y la invencibilidad del PTC como gran partido de lider y de tipo jucheano, que lleva adelante la historia y tradicion de victorias, y el poderio ideo-politico de las filas revolucionarias unidas monoliticamente en torno al partido y al lider, enfatizaron.
					
					Llamaron a todos los militantes del partido, los funcionarios y los trabajadores a avivar mas las llamas del movimiento de creacion de velocidad de Mallima con el espiritu e impetu manifestados en la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad y materializar estrictamente la resolucion del Congreso del PTC.
					
					Expresaron las decisiones de levantarse como un solo hombre en la materializacion de la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC y hacer contribucion activa a adelantar el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de la potencia prospera socialista.
					
					Acto seguido, se desarrollaron las manifestaciones multitudinarias.

articles.title: Tendra lugar XIX Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Primaveral de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Tendra lugar XIX Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Primaveral de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar del dia 23 al 26 de mayo en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones la XIX Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Primaveral de Pyongyang. 
					Alli participaran mas de 220 companias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Nueva Zelanda, Alemania, Rusia, Rumania, Malasia, Mongolia, Singapur, China, Camboya, Tailandia, Australia, Iran, Italia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Cuba y Taipei de China. 
					
					Se presentaran las mercancias fabricadas en varios dominios como las industrias electronica, mecanica, metalurgica, alimentaria y de articulos de uso diario, la de materiales de construccion y el transporte mediante la aplicacion de los avanzados cientificos y tecnicos.

articles.title: Posesion de armas nucleares de RPDC es resultado de politica hostil de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Posesion de armas nucleares de RPDC es resultado de politica hostil de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- La posesion de armas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea modifico completamente la estructura de la fuerza de la Tierra, lo que es el resultado merecido de la politica de hostilidad de EE.UU.
					Insiste asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este martes y continua:
					
					La paz no se defiende por las palabras sino por las poderosas fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Tomamos las contramedidas independientes frente a las acciones hostiles de EE.UU. encaminadas a eliminar en lo fisico la RPDC. 
					
					Esto es el derecho legitimo e inalienable de un Estado soberano, indicado en la Carta de la ONU. 
					
					EE.UU. es el autor que causo el problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, empujo a la RPDC a la posesion de armas nucleares y ejerce la amenaza nuclear sobre el pais socialista. 
					
					La RPDC, que era un pais desnuclearizado, aspiraba mas que nadie la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana e hizo todo lo posible por el respecto desde cuando el imperio americano comenzaba a introducir las armas nucleares en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Pero, los esfuerzos de la RPDC quedaron infructiferos debido a EE.UU. 
					
					La realidad demuestra que mientras no se elimine la arraigada politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC, no se resolvera ningun problema sino se aumentara el peligro de confrontacion y conflictos armados. 
					
					La posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC es la opcion mas justa en el mundo actual en que un pais debil no puede proteger a si mismo. 
					
					Mientras EE.UU. no abandone la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC ni elimine radicalmente la amenaza nuclear, no renunciaremos primero las armas nucleares. 
					
					Se consolidara vertiginosamente la capacidad de ataque nuclear de la RPDC.
